p: The core measure “CO2 fleet limit value of 60 g/km by 2030” is a lead instrument from the field of the regulatory toolbox. The CO2 limit for new cars is considered to have the most far-reaching effect as it addresses the entire new car fleet and almost all manufacturers (with the exception of very small fleets). This measure is a typical technology push measure, as it forces manufacturers to push forward technological developments and offer them on the market, with a focus on CO2 emission reduction during the car usage phase.
